name: Rytm Språkspel
description:
The title directly translates to 'Rhythm Language Game'

For this prompt, I tried to think of a game that could represent myself well; and thought about how much I was having trouble practicing Swedish vowels while learning. So, I made this fun rhythm game (one of my favorite genres if you havent noticed) that uses microphone input to prompt you to practice saying the three unique swedish vowels: å, ö, and ö.
